PredictionMarketV2.description: Full prediction market with resolution mechanism, on-chain Levenshtein - RECOMMENDED

PredictionMarket.description: Simple prediction market V1 (NO resolution mechanism - DEPRECATED)

EnhancedPredictionMarket.description: Full governance prediction market (requires active actors - NOT USABLE)

NodeRegistry.description: Node operator staking (0 active nodes, requires 100 ETH stake)

notes.v2Update: PredictionMarketV2 deployed 2024-12-03 with full resolution mechanism
notes.deprecation: PredictionMarket (V1) had no resolution - winners could not be determined
notes.governance: EnhancedPredictionMarket requires NodeRegistry->ActorRegistry bootstrap before use
